about.Content: I am passionate about creating and developing web applications and software, always looking for the most optimal and efficient solutions. With experience in using modern technologies such as TypeScript, React and Tailwind CSS. I love learning and applying new technologies.

titleintro.Title: Power is not in the tools, but in the mind that codes.

work.content:
- I had the opportunity to intern at a technology company where I got to work on real-world software development projects. During my internship, I learned how to work in a team, manage my time, and apply my knowledge to solving real-world problems.

 - This was an important stepping stone to help me better understand the professional working environment and strengthen my skills.

university.content:
- I had the opportunity to intern at a technology company where I got to work on real-world software development projects. During my internship, I learned how to work in a team, manage my time, and apply my knowledge to solving real-world problems.

- These experiences nurtured a passion for technology and a willingness to adapt to change.

highSchool.content:
- In high school, where I not only built a solid foundation of knowledge but also trained my thinking skills and proactive learning.

- During my studies, I actively participated in extracurricular activities and competitions, which helped develop my communication and teamwork skills and better prepared me for my future studies.

secondarySchool.content:
- In high school, I began expand my knowledge and sharpen my critical thinking skills. I challenged myself with advanced subjects and explored different fields of study, which helped me gain a deeper understanding of various concepts.

- Beyond academics, I actively participated in group projects and extracurricular activities, taking on leadership roles whenever possible. These experiences improved my problem-solving abilities, teamwork, and communication skills, all of which prepared me for future academic and personal growth.

management.manageUsersDesc: Assign permissions and update user roles
management.addMusicDesc: Create new songs and add them to the system
management.addTopicDesc: Create new topics and assign song lists
management.addPlaylistDesc: Create new playlists for the music library
management.addSingerDesc: Manage singer profiles and artist information
management.noAccess: You don't have access to this section.

player.loginRequired: Please sign in to use this feature!

playlist.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this playlist?

addMusic.title: New Music
addMusic.chooseExistingSinger: Choose existing singer: Song will be added to that singer's list
addMusic.enterNewSinger: Enter a new singer: Song will be added to the general musics collection
addMusic.singerCreatedAuto: Singer profile will be created automatically when you add your first song with info:
addMusic.errorSelectSongEdit: Please select a song to edit!
addMusic.errorSelectSongDelete: Please select a song to delete!
addMusic.confirmDeleteSong: Are you sure you want to delete this song?

login.title: Sign In
login.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
login.errorConnection: Connection error. Please try again later.
login.errorUsernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
login.errorPasswordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

register.title: Sign Up
register.subtitle: Create an account to get started
register.hasAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
register.success: Registration successful! Redirecting to sign in...
register.errorUsernameMin: Username must be at least 3 characters
register.errorUsernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers and underscore
register.errorPasswordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
register.errorPasswordWeak: Password too weak. Please use a stronger password.
register.errorConnection: Connection error. Please try again later.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email to receive reset link
forgotPassword.success: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox.
forgotPassword.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
forgotPassword.errorConnection: Connection error. Please try again later.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.success: Password reset successful! Redirecting to sign in...
resetPassword.invalidToken: Invalid or expired link. Please request a new password reset.
resetPassword.errorPasswordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters
resetPassword.errorConnection: Connection error. Please try again later.
